result.markdown: --- title: "Week 8: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * AR, MA, ARMA and ARIMA models * Selecting model orders manually and automatically ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercise 1-4 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html) ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-seminar activities Read [Sections 9.3-9.8 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Assignments * [IA3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Monday 28 April. * [GA3](../assignments/G3.qmd) is due on Monday 05 May.
